title: Programming and Teamwork
blurb: Starting our first developmental activity, Pilot Program 4, we are hoping this program will enable programmers to learn a project-oriented and colloborative environment to develop an end-user product for the community.

title: Scratch & Python Turtle!
blurb: With the initation of Pilot Program 2, we are currently able to enlarge our capacity to help more neurodivergent kids. Looking forward to help more of the community!

title: Pilot Program 1 Ended
blurb: The neurodivergent kids learnt quite a bit from this 8 week journey of fun and hands-on learning on base concept of computer science! We were also astonished to see a lot of members are also interested to help out!

title: Pilot Program 0 Ended
blurb: Our very first program ended with a sense of wonder! I thank our member Eric X. and William M. for helping out early on!

title: Pilot Program 1 Initiated!
blurb: This program expands a little bit more on topics that include Scratch and Minecraft Makecode!

title: Organization Founding!
blurb: This organization was founded on July 3, 2021!

title: Pilot Program 0
blurb: This is a program for most of our board members to learn, tryout, and prepare before we go out and help the community!
